amendment.description: An amendment printed as amendment No. 67 in the Congressional Record of June 4, 1996, to limit to $22 million the amount of funds to be appropriated to Turkey under the Economic Support Fund until such time as that country acknowledges the atrocity committed against the Armenian population by the Ottoman Empire from 1915 to 1923.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Radanovich amendment was withdrawn.
